src_original: oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāya jñāna sūviniścita tejo rājāya statha-āgatāyarhante sa (39)  myaka sambuddhāya ||
tadyatā ||  oṁ pūṇya 2 mahāpūṇya aparimita pūṇya aparimitāyū pūṇya jñāna saṁbhāro pacite ||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitoyū jñāna sūviniścita tejo raye sa tathāgatāya arhante samyakasambuddhāya ||  tadyathā ||  oṁ pūṇya 2 mahāpūṇya-aparimittapūṇya aparimitāyū pūṇya jñāna saṁbhāro pacite ||
oṁ sarvasaskāra pariśuddha dharmete gagana samadra te svabhāva viśuddhe mahānaya parivāre svāhā || 21 ||
